value.title: Secure Azure Active Directory users with Multi-Factor Authentication
value.excerpt: Learn how to use multi-factor authentication with Azure AD to harden your user accounts.

value.title: Secure your application by using OpenID Connect and Azure AD
value.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to enable users to authenticate in multiple systems by using their Azure AD identities.

value.title: Secure your Azure SQL Database
value.excerpt: Secure an Azure SQL database to keep the information safe and diagnose potential security concerns as they happen.

value.title: Stage a web app deployment for testing and rollback by using App Service deployment slots
value.excerpt: Discover the benefits of creating deployment slots to streamline deployment and roll back a web app in Azure App Service.

value.title: Store and Access NoSQL Data with Azure Cosmos DB and the Table API
value.excerpt: By using the Azure Cosmos DB Table API, you will benefit from the low latency, high availability, and scalability of Azure Cosmos DB in a Table storage application.

value.title: Transcribe speech input to text
value.excerpt: Speech to text from the speech service, known as speech recognition, enables real time transcription of audio streams into text. Your applications, tools, or devices can consume, display, and take action on this text as command input.

value.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage
value.excerpt: Learn about creating an Azure Data Lake Storage account and uploading data to Data Lake Storage Gen 2 through the Azure Storage Explorer.

value.title: An overview of Azure Data Explorer (ADX) | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Manoj Raheja joins Lara Rubbelke to demonstrate Azure Data Explorer (ADX) and provide an overview of the service from provisioning to querying. value.title: Plan and implement data platform resources
value.excerpt: Deploy data platform resources in Azure for SQL Server and Open Source databases. Explore options for upgrade and migration.  Calculate resource requirements and create templates.

topItems.title: Deploy SQL Server in a virtual machine
topItems.excerpt: Configure virtual machine sizing, storage, and networking options to ensure adequate performance for your database workloads. Choose and configure appropriate high availability options. Investigate options for migrating existing workloads.

topItems.title: Deploy Azure SQL Database
topItems.excerpt: Provision and deploy Azure SQL Database and SQL Server Managed Instances. Select the appropriate options when performing a migration to the SQL PaaS platform.

topItems.title: Deploy MariaDB, MySQL, and PostgreSQL on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Compare Open Source Azure Database offerings with Azure SQL Server offerings. Configure an Open Source database and configure high availability and security options.

value.title: Add basic conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
value.excerpt: Learn to identify valuable information in conversations with LUIS for interpreting user goals (intents) and distill valuable information from sentences (entities).

value.title: Analyze DevOps Continuous Planning and Continuous Integration
value.excerpt: Explore the first two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Planning and Continuous Integration.

value.title: Automate machine learning model selection with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to use automated machine learning in Azure Machine Learning to find the best model for your data.
